data.eml:eml: Two new species of Xanthophius Motschulsky (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae, Staphylininae, Xantholinini) from China with notes on X. filum (Kraatz)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Yu-Lingzi, Zhou, Hong-Zhang (2013): Two new species of Xanthophius Motschulsky (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae, Staphylininae, Xantholinini) from China with notes on X. filum (Kraatz). Zootaxa 3626 (3): 363-380, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3626.3.5
